default_settings.name: SLACK_ANNOUNCE_CHANNEL
default_settings.value: Channel name in Slack where the bot will announce new sessions

default_settings.name: SLACK_API_TOKEN
default_settings.value: Your API Token for Slack. Note: must be a user token, not a bot token.

desc: A Greenbot bot that forwards standard in to Slack; forwards Slack to standard out.
name: greenbot-slackbot
short_desc: A Greenbot bot that forwards standard in to Slack; forwards Slack to standard out.
